channel.title: Coords

item.title: Coords
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

Hey, how do you figure out your coords on a 503 client and server. I tried ::mypos, because i saw that in my commands.java but it didn’t work…but i noticed it was a mod and owner command…So i changed the owners name to mine to make it me owner…(in playerlogin.java) if (p.username.equals("Rocket")) { p.rights = 2; }
And it still won’t give me the Coords. So im stuck. Any help?

Read full topic
